meaningMnemonic: The <radical>west</radical> radical and the <kanji>west</kanji> kanji are the same. Isn't that nice?
readingMnemonic: People are attacking from the <kanji>west</kanji>, so you pull out your <reading>sa</reading>ber (せい) and beat them back. You keep pushing further and further west until you reach the ocean and there's nowhere left for them to run.
